::Element::

Element laughs, not knowing what they meant about the other Maximal. 
But whoever the other Maximal was, he doubted they would give up a 
hostage over a done affair.

"Wanna make a wager of that?" he says to Motormaster about the speed 
issue, the jets on his wings keeping him hovering in the air. He knew 
that in the state that most of these bots were, he might be able to 
catch them.

Suddenly, the four missiles that were circling above drop, mentally 
guided by Element toward Speedbreaker. At the same time, Element 
gives a sudden mental jerk, trying to get Dead End out of 
Speedbreaker's grip and into his own.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaster camly looks him over, "If I give you this Maximal, then 
the one
> at base dies automatically, capish, besides, we are all much faster 
than
> you are, loser" he spat with contempt.
